name: Hank's Voyage
description:
This project was abandoned for a few years but it has been resurrected! A new team is working on it for a while now. There is still a lot of work to be done but we would really like to know what you think of it. Our intention is to add more content soon, so follow us and keep in touch!

Follow us on social media:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hanksvoyage

Twitter: @HanksVoyage

Hank's Voyage is a 2D action/adventure platformer set in Egypt in the 50s. Join Hank and his friends on an adventure to rescue your friend and uncover the secrets of ancient Egypt!


Play as Hank, the hat fanatic jazz singer, and make your way through the ancient ruins of Egypt as well as many other locations. You might wanna hold onto that hat, though...

Use your hat to your advantage in various ways such as triggering levers and platforms, defeating enemies, and clearing your way. What else might you be able to do with it, hmm?

Sneak past guards, defeat enemies and use them for your advantage. What if there was a way to somehow fly over large gorges, or even make two enemies face against each other? 

Meet friends and strangers on your way for help and guidance. There are secrets beyond your wildest dreams to come!

...and much more!

In Hank’s Voyage, you follow Hank, a famous jazz singer, who is secretly a highly trained agent. He must use his multipurpose hat in various different ways to solve puzzles and sneak past enemies to rescue his friend, Ben.

One of Hank’s colleagues, agent Ben Duncan, goes missing in Egypt, and Hank volunteers to take care of what seems to be a routine mission. Ben’s forgetful nature has created these kinds of situations before, so nobody seems to be really surprised or worried. When Hank arrives, what he finds out is much more than a regular situation. Ben hasn’t appeared in the hotel that he was supposed to be staying over for days. His last known location is the desert of Giza.

  • Experience a fresh take on a 16-bit styled platformer game with a whimsical comic-book style.
  • Your hat is your best ally. Use it to attack, collect, distract, and interact with various objects.
  • Solve different kinds of puzzles. Many times there is more than one way.
  • Use the enemies to your advantage. They can be of great help if you know how to use them.
  • Try to be silent and hide from your enemies when necessary.
  • Observe the environment. There are a lot of secrets waiting to be discovered.
  • The humorous, tongue-in-cheek story revolves around a jazz star singer Hank, who also works as a secret agent.

#platformer #retro
